description:
Aguila`s subordinate. He used to know Radha Bairaban from Mao Industries. He disliked Aguila`s way of handling the School children, so he tried being nice to them, and gave them names. He was well liked by them.
He died during the attempted self-restoration of the Earth Cradle. He asked for Radha to forgive him for betraying her, and for what he did to Ouka and the others.
name: Cuervo Sero
